attributes.review: If I could give this app a 0/10 I would. I opened the app after downloading it my phone crashed. I can not go on any of my apps. I will never be downloading this app again! Honestly this app has only made my phone run slower and has been spam texting me for the past few days. I am so confused about why Trump would do this to me.
